en: He is the last man I want to see.

en: He is the very man that I'm looking for.

en: The last time when I saw him, he was quite well.
ja: 彼は私がこの前会ったときはすこぶる元気だった。

en: He was not conscious of my presence here.

en: He thanked me for coming.

en: He seemed unconscious of my presence.
ja: 彼は私がいることに気づかない様子だった。

en: He remained single till the end of his day.

en: He was in prison for life.

en: He is afraid of death.

en: He is afraid of death.

en: Will he die?

en: He has one foot in the grave.

en: He is on the point of death.

en: He signaled them to stop.
